original_text: Nobody will ever hear music in the city again. Nobody will sing there. Nobody will make music with harps, or with flutes, or with trumpets. There will never be workers who make things in the city. Nobody will ever hear the sound of people who make flour again. Nobody will ever hear music in the city again. Nobody will sing there. Nobody will make music with harps, or with flutes, or with trumpets. There will never be workers who make things in the city. Nobody will ever hear the sound of people who make flour again. Nobody will ever hear music in the city again. Nobody will sing there. Nobody will make music with harps, or with flutes, or with trumpets. There will never be workers who make things in the city. Nobody will ever hear the sound of people who make flour again. Nobody will ever hear music in the city again.
korean_text: 또 거문고 타는 자와 풍류하는 자와 퉁소 부는 자와 나팔 부는 자들의 소리가 결코 다시 네 안에서 들리지 아니하고 어떠한 세공업자든지 결코 다시 네 안에서 보이지 아니하고 또 맷돌 소리가 결코 다시 네 안에서 들리지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: Nobody will ever hear music in the city again.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 더 이상 그 도시에서 음악을 듣지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody will make music with harps,
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하프로 음악을 만들지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: There will never be workers who make things in the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 도시에는 물건을 만드는 일꾼이 전혀 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody will ever hear the sound of people who make flour again.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 더 이상 밀가루를 만드는 사람들의 소리를 듣지 못할 것이다.
